testcase.classname: Verify All Products and product detail page
testcase.system-out: Given the User Launch URL...................................................passed Then the user Verify that home page is visible successfully................passed When the user Click on Products button.....................................passed Then the user Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully...passed Then the user verify The products list is visible...........................passed When the user Click on View Product of first product........................passed And the User is landed to product detail page...............................passed Then the user Verify that detail detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand name.passed
